Cupertino.Permanente Quarry: The Permanente Quarry is a limestone quarry in an unincorporated area of Santa Clara County, California, located just west of Cupertino, California. The quarry is a limestone and aggregate mining operation and cement plant, owned by Lehigh Southwest Cement, a subsidiary of HeidelbergCement. Since 1939 the plant has been in operation and is responsible for the production or more than half of the cement used in the Bay Area.
